name: Rainsha
description:
RAINSHA! - Rogue Artificial Intelligence and Spirit Hunter Association

A rogue-like adventure 2D platfomer made in Unity.

The world was advancing at a pace never seen before. With the help of friendly spirits technology was flourishing but so was the waste. Soon, the world became polluted. One by one, everything was getting corrupted. The technology and spirits once so trusted, turned against their ignorant owners. Humanity was cornered with nowhere to go. With the world's most brilliant minds, the Floating City of AIRE (Airborne Inter-Regional Establishment) was built for the survival of humanity. A force of protectors was established to defend against the constant threat of evil spirits and robots. "RAINSHA" fought with the endless abyss that was once their hometown. In the midst of this chaos, a mysterious warrior comes across a spirit, trying to survive the abyss.
